languages.text: "Чада Императора, я благословляю вас на бой! Сегодня Он пребудет с нами!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
languages.original_text: "Чада Императора, я благословляю вас на бой! Сегодня Он пребудет с нами!"

traits.locale_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
"Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

languages.text: "Kinder des Imperators, ich segne Euren Kreuzzug! Heute wacht Er über uns!"
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

traits.locale_text: "Kinder des Imperators, ich segne Euren Kreuzzug! Heute wacht Er über uns!"

languages.text: « Enfants de l'Empereur, je bénis votre croisade ! Aujourd'hui, Il veille sur nous ! »
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

traits.locale_text: « Enfants de l'Empereur, je bénis votre croisade ! Aujourd'hui, Il veille sur nous ! »

languages.text: «¡Hijos del Emperador, bendigo vuestra cruzada! ¡Hoy, Él vela por nosotros!».
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Hijos del Emperador, bendigo vuestra cruzada! ¡Hoy, Él vela por nosotros!».

languages.text: 「皇帝の子らよ、お前たちの聖戦を祝福しよう！今日、主は我らを見守ってくださっている！」
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の子らよ、お前たちの聖戦を祝福しよう！今日、主は我らを見守ってくださっている！」

languages.text: “帝皇的孩子们，我祝福你们的征途！今天，祂必将眷顾我们！”
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇的孩子们，我祝福你们的征途！今天，祂必将眷顾我们！”

languages.text: "İmparator'un çocukları! Cihadınızı kutsarım! O bizi gözetir!"
languages.original_text: "Children of the Emperor, I bless your crusade! Today, He watches over us!"
